task.summary: Default task
BON-264: ZID creation implemented. Pokery to get other pages to reflect new ZID in session.
BON-264: Basic Zone members feature provided.
BON-271: Basic member acknowledgement page and controller complete
BON-268: basic ability to save zones to browser store
BON-293: Refactored web3 out into global function with correct singleton pattern and implemented zone creation on list view with it.
BON-298: Consolidated adding members and acknowledgement onto the list view
BON-274: after unlocking the user is presented with the list view
BON-298: made the zone states implicit in the image used to represent them. show zones as list of font awsome images.
BON-298: sorted list of zones with newest first (descending)
BON-298: added bootstrap tooltip support for explanations of states
Commit before attempting migration to Iron Router from Flow Router

BON-298: patterns for Zone icons to change and reflect lifecycle status. Migrated back to Iron Router from Flow Router. Zone template abstracted out of list view to handle each Zone in isolation. etc.
BON-298: router configured to pass zone doc id through to members page and populate form for adding members.
BON-298: bug fix to acknowledge js and removal of test forms in list page.
BON-301: Introduced sAlert. Inlcuded menu in layout from a template in imports so we can have a js controller to back it.
BON-301: Rolled alert out across app where errors or feedback required.
BON-270: introduced prototype page for putting info and a recipient on a zonw and actioning it.
renamed edit to action and updated router etc to accomodate change
BON-272: Basic personal details local storage. Only one instance permitted.
BON-272: console logging removed etc. cleanup.
BON-270: and other stuff like limit stored Zones to five.
BON-311: added a created field on Zone records with a date type so order of ZOnes will be consistent (listed latest to oldest)
BON-311: introduced lookups for content of tooltips and symbols. Introduced state change storage in local store and used that for changing symbols against current state.
BON-306: corrected ZID to ZAD when referring to a Zone
BON-306: lots of cosmetic improvements.
BON-306: a few more word crafting improvements.
BON-306: put a version in about.
BON-306: front page asthetics...now stop..ahhhghgh.
Syncing tag version with display on about page.
Introduced double click to make it very deliberate to take action on a Zone. Single clicking the Address now produces a QR Code.
exploring camera use from a browser for scanning qr codes. experimentation with jsqrcode.
got a test Reader page that reads a QR Code
got the QR reader working on the Acknowledge page
QR code working under https but when under https we run into cross domain problem with accessing geth over http. QR code remains but will not work while this configuration uses http to geth node.
Ethereum node IP address for dev network
Resolved bu where I forget to replace hard coded ZID with call ti web3.eth.balance()
dependency code not covered in npm or meteor package management
BON-304: implemented form for node address and store to persist and update it.
BON-316: added CONFIRMED state on zone view and removed "constant" on zone contract confirm() function so it transacted.
BON-332: added the property for a name or label on a Zone, provided a prompt for it and referred to it on the key views.
BON-332: introduce Zone delete feature on code qr share view
Brought About page up to date.
BON-276: hook implemented to intercept routes redirect to unlock account page if not already unlocked
Improved look and feel of add members view.
Extended look and feel changes across views
Improved personal data view and revised share zone id view
Improved personal data view and revised share zone id view
tidy up commit
BON-154: End User License Agreement on about page.
